description:
Minor material amendment application to vary condition 32 (approved plans) together with associated deletion of conditions 9, 15 and 22, variation of conditions: 1, 3, 8, 10, 12, 13, 14, 16, 17, 18, 20, 21, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30 and 31a and insertion of new condition regarding Code of Sustainable Homes relating to planning permission P092517 dated 25/06/2010 for the: Erection of two buildings comprising a part 2, 3 and 5-storey building and a 5-storey building providing for 80 dwellings at part ground and wholly to upper levels and two ground floor units for flexible use: A1 (shop)/A2 (financial/professional services)/B1(business) / D1(non-residential institutions)/D2 (assembly & leisure), together with the formation of a new road, disabled car-parking and erection of an electrical sub-station.  The minor material amendments are:
A]      internal reconfiguration of dwelling and Block layouts, including the reduction of the number of stair/lift cores from 3 to 2 within Block B; amendment to dwelling mix and affordable housing tenure split
B]      reconfiguration of cycle parking and creation of a new external cycle storage area to the rear of Block B; inclusion of a CHP plant room 
C]      revision of elevational treatment of all elevations to both Blocks A and B
D]      Clarification of the scale of the development: erection of a part 1 and 5-storey building with a 4th floor setback (Block A) and a part 3 and 5-storey building (Block B) with a part 4th floor setback;  increase in building height  by between 0.49m and 0.65m; and amendment of the rear building-lines
E]      retention of electrical sub-station and emergency escape staircase in their existing locations and associated amendment to the new road layout, which would subsequently not form an adopted road
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 25-Jun-2013.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 25-Jun-2010 [LBI ref: P092517].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5)
